ValidationRule.description: Ready for Client Review can only be checked when Status is Backlog. This checkbox is used to submit Backlog tasks for client approval.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Ready_for_Client_Review__c = TRUE, TEXT(Status__c) != "Backlog", OR( ISCHANGED(Ready_for_Client_Review__c), ISCHANGED(Status__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ready for Client Review can only be checked when Status is Backlog. Please change Status to Backlog before submitting for client review.
